chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
R: Type
Rone: R
Rzero: R
Rminus: R -> R -> R
Rmult: R -> R -> R
Rplus: R -> R -> R
Ropp: R -> R
R_is_ring: ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq

Goal:
forall x y : M22, ⊟ x ⊠ y = ⊟ (x ⊠ y)

Premises:
ring_theory : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> Prop
Notation z := Rzero
M22 = (R * R * R * R)%type : Type
Notation o := Rone
eq_sigT_hprop : (forall (x : ?A) (p q : ?P x), p = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A & ?P a}, projT1 u = projT1 v -> u = v where ?A : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq |- Type] ?P : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq |- ?A -> Type]
eq_sigT : forall (u v : {a : ?A & ?P a}) (p : projT1 u = projT1 v), eq_rect (projT1 u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (projT2 u) (projT1 v) p = projT2 v -> u = v where ?A : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq |- Type] ?P : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq |- ?A -> Type]
eq_sig2 : forall (u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}) (p : proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)), eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p = proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) -> eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?Q a) (proj3_sig u) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p = proj3_sig v -> u = v where ?A : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R ->...-> Prop]
eq_sig2_uncurried : forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}, {p : proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) | eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p = proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) & eq_rect (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u)) (fun a : ?A => ?Q a) (proj3_sig u) (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v)) p = proj3_sig v} -> u = v where ?A : [R : Type Rzero : R Rone : R Rplus : R -> R -> R Rmult : R -> R -> R Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R ->...-> Prop]
Rring_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : list R) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr Z), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq (gen_phiZ z o Rplus Rmult ∸) id_phi_N (pow_N o Rmult) l lpe ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ (gen_phiZ z o Rplus Rmult ∸) id_phi_N (pow_N o Rmult) l pe1 = Ring_polynom.PEeval z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ (gen_phiZ z o Rplus Rmult ∸) id_phi_N (pow_N o Rmult) l pe2
M22mult_assoc : forall x y u : M22, x ⊠ (y ⊠ u) = x ⊠ y ⊠ u
M22_mult_distr_r : forall x y u : M22, (y ⊞ u) ⊠ x = y ⊠ x ⊞ u ⊠ x
M22_mult_distr_l : forall x y u : M22, x ⊠ (y ⊞ u) = x ⊠ y ⊞ x ⊠ u
M22minus : forall x : M22, x ⊞ ⊟ x = ZE_22
M22mult_one_r : forall x : M22, x ⊠ ID_22 = x
M22mult_one_l : forall x : M22, ID_22 ⊠ x = x
Radd_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)
Rmul_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)
Rdistr_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul (radd x y) z) (radd (rmul x z) (rmul y z))
Acc_intro : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (x : A), (forall y : A, R y x -> Acc R y) -> Acc R x
mk_rt : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), (forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x) -> (forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x)) -> (forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)) -> (forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x) -> (forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x)) -> (forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)) ->...-> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req
ARadd_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)
rsub_ext4 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req x y -> forall x0 y0 : R, req x0 y0 -> req (rsub x x0) (rsub y y0)
Rmul_comm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x)
Radd_comm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x)
ARadd_assoc1 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd (radd x y) z) (radd (radd y z) x)
Rsub_def : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (rsub x y) (radd x (ropp y))
mk_art : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), (forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x) -> (forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x)) -> (forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)) -> (forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x) -> (forall x : R, req (rmul rO x) rO) -> (forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x)) -> (forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)) ->...-> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req
gen_phiZ_mul : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : Z, req (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp (x * y)) (rmul (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp x) (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp y))
gen_phiZ_add : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : Z, req (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp (x + y)) (radd (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp x) (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp y))
Ropp_mul_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (ropp (rmul x y)) (rmul (ropp x) y)
Ropp_add : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (ropp (radd x y)) (radd (ropp x) (ropp y))
Smorph_sub : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceq : C -> C -> Prop) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), ring_theory cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceq -> semi_morph rO rI radd rmul req cO cI cadd cmul ceqb phi ->...-> forall x y : C, req (phi (csub x y)) (rsub (phi x) (phi y))
Smorph_opp : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceq : C -> C -> Prop) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), ring_theory cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceq -> semi_morph rO rI radd rmul req cO cI cadd cmul ceqb phi ->...-> forall x : C, req (phi (copp x)) (ropp (phi x))
gen_phiZ_ext : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> forall x y : Z, x = y -> req (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp x) (gen_phiZ rO rI radd rmul ropp y)

```coq
intros x y.
unfold M22; simpl.
rewrite M22mult_assoc, M22_mult_distr_l, M22mult_assoc, M22_mult_distr_r.
rewrite M22minus, M22mult_one_l.
reflexivity.
Qed.

original: intros x y. unfold M22; simpl. rewrite M22mult_assoc, M22_mult_distr_l, M22mult_assoc, M22_mult_distr_r. rewrite M22minus, M22mult_one_l. reflexivity.
